keyword: how many calories in a cheese stick
title: How Many Calories in a Cheese Stick?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a cheese stick, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Cheese Stick?
assumptions: Standard mozzarella string cheese stick, 1 oz (28 g), pasteurized, no added flavors or coatings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (e.g., cheddar vs. mozzarella), size, and processing; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical cheese stick contains about 80 kcal and 6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp nuts for crunch per stick

faqs.q: How many calories in a cheese stick?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for a standard 1 oz mozzarella cheese stick.

faqs.q: Is a cheese stick high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, it provides around 6 g protein per stick.

faqs.q: What about fat content in a cheese stick?
faqs.a: Typically 6 g total fat, including 4 g saturated fat.
Very lowâ€”only about 1 g carbs and 0 g fiber per stick.

faqs.q: Does brand affect calories in cheese sticks?
faqs.a: Yes, low-fat brands may have 50-70 kcal, while full-fat can reach 90+ kcal.
